7 Day Challenge

Day 3 - Portrait photoshoot at home

In today’s lesson we’re going to be we’re going to look at 3 composition techniques to easily take portraits at home. 

The activity for today is to shoot a portrait (of yourself, a friend, a pet or even a stuffed animal) and experiment with one of the three techniques that we taught you - negative space, symmetry and playing with textures and shadows. 

Good luck everyone.
